attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister Brown, when you came into power, I thought you were some kind of a nice and straight guy, but recent events has proved otherwise. The sleeze and corruption in your government has come to such an appalling extent that your personal integrity is now under serious scrutiny. I do want to believe that all these fiasco, including the McBride
blogs are wsithout your approval, but, how can he do it without your knowledge? Do you seriously think people could not see through your duplicity? Please, submit yourself now to us, electorate, so we can decide whether we still want you or not. Thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
